Please release a better anti-cheat system. This game is unplayable in China.

Yes, CS:GO is a good game, even tho its 8 years old. Although the game can get little frustrating and repetative, but its fun if played with friends. Theres enough variety in gamemodes to keep playing, but it does get a little hard and annoying at times. Skill comes with hard work, and that hard work can get exhausting and reperative. But if you have enough dedication and patience, you'll eventually start to see improvements in aim and gamesense. 

If you want just that extra bit of edge, watch some pros break down some famous clips, or try yourself. Maybe just watch some tutorials on some grenade throws that might help you in-game. You could also listen to pro teams' coms. Because, we all know that communication is key.

So all in all, if you're playing faceit, dont be toxic, not even in normal matchmaking. Because, that is one of the most common things that break down a team, it makes them perform worse, and ultimately lose. Stay humble, and have fun :)
